title: GeochronologicBoundary
description: A <font color="#4f81bd">GeochronologicBoundary</font> is a boundary between two geochronologic time periods.

position.title: position
position.description: A point in time corresponding to the era boundary

positionalUncertainty.title: positionalUncertainty
positionalUncertainty.description: A measure of the uncertainty in the estimate of the point in time of the era boundary

stratotype.title: stratotype
stratotype.description: The property stratotype is an association between a GeochronologicBoundary and a StratigraphicPoint that are associated with the boundary. A GeochronologicBoundary can be associated with more than one StratigraphicPoints, but only one may have GSSP ratified status. The others are proposed equivalents.
